[lynx-testing-environment](/api/lynx-testing-environment/index.mdx) / LynxTestingEnvironment

# 类: LynxTestingEnvironment

A pure-JavaScript implementation of the [Lynx Spec](https://lynxjs.org/guide/spec.html),
notably the [Element PAPI](https://lynxjs.org/api/engine/element-api) and [Dual-threaded Model](https://lynxjs.org/guide/spec#dual-threaded-model) for use with Node.js.

## 示例

```ts
import { LynxTestingEnvironment } from '@lynx-js/testing-environment';

const lynxTestingEnvironment = new LynxTestingEnvironment();

lynxTestingEnvironment.switchToMainThread();
// use the main thread Element PAPI
const page = __CreatePage('0', 0);
const view = __CreateView(0);
__AppendElement(page, view);

```


## 属性

### backgroundThread

```ts
backgroundThread: LynxGlobalThis;
```

The global object for the background thread.

#### 示例

```ts
import { LynxTestingEnvironment } from '@lynx-js/testing-environment';

const lynxTestingEnvironment = new LynxTestingEnvironment();

lynxTestingEnvironment.switchToBackgroundThread();
// use the background thread global object
globalThis.lynxCoreInject.tt.OnLifecycleEvent(...args);
```

### mainThread

```ts
mainThread: any;
```

The global object for the main thread.

#### 示例

```ts
import { LynxTestingEnvironment } from '@lynx-js/testing-environment';

const lynxTestingEnvironment = new LynxTestingEnvironment();

lynxTestingEnvironment.switchToMainThread();
// use the main thread global object
const page = globalThis.__CreatePage('0', 0);
const view = globalThis.__CreateView(0);
globalThis.__AppendElement(page, view);
```

index.d.ts:106
